PHRASE.LANG: The monocle of a cartographer. It's perfect for drawing maps, restoring maps or deciphering maps. Basically, it's great for anything to do with maps. Plus, it will make you look distinguished.[#Legal]

Le monocle d'un cartographe. Parfait pour dessiner des cartes, restaurer des cartes ou déchiffrer des cartes. Bref, c'est l'outil idéal pour tout ce qui touche aux cartes. Qui plus est, ça te donnera un air distingué.[#Legal]

Das Monokel eines Kartenzeichners. Es eignet sich perfekt zum Zeichnen, Restaurieren und Entziffern von Karten. Es ist für alles gut, das mit Karten zu tun hat. Außerdem lässt es dich wichtig aussehen.[#Legal]
Il monocolo di un cartografo. È perfetto per disegnare mappe, restaurarle o decifrarle. In pratica, è ottimo per qualunque cosa riguardi le mappe. E in più, ti darà un'aria distinta.[#Legal]

El monóculo del cartógrafo. Es perfecto para dibujar mapas, restaurarlos o descifrarlos. Básicamente te vendrá de maravilla para todo lo que quieras hacer con los mapas. Además, te hará parecer un señor distinguido.[#Legal]

The monocle of a cartographer. It's perfect for drawing maps, restoring maps or deciphering maps. Basically, it's great for anything to do with maps. Plus, it will make you look distinguished.[#Legal]

The monocle of a cartographer. It's perfect for drawing maps, restoring maps or deciphering maps. Basically, it's great for anything to do with maps. Plus, it will make you look distinguished.[#Legal]
